statements: SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type FROM audit_trail ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT transaction_type FROM audit_trail WHERE transaction_id IN (2, 3, 4) ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_data FROM audit_trail WHERE transaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM audit_trail WHERE transaction_type LIKE 'INSERT%' AND user_id = 54321;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM audit_trail GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND transaction_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM audit_trail WHERE transaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_data LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT audit_action FROM transaction_audit WHERE audit_user = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.user_id, a.audit_action FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_audit a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id WHERE a.audit_user LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY a.audit_timestamp ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, a.audit_user FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_audit a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id WHERE a.audit_action = 'Approved' ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_audit ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_reason FROM dispute_resolution WHERE resolution_status = 'resolved'
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_status = 'active' LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transaction_audit
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transaction_audit WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT user_id, dispute_reason FROM transaction_audit JOIN dispute_resolution ON transaction_audit.transaction_id = dispute_resolution.transaction_id WHERE dispute_resolution.resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_audit;
SELECT contract_name, contract_status FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_status = 'Active' ORDER BY contract_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, description FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_reason FROM disputes WHERE resolved = false;
SELECT history_id, modification_date FROM transaction_history WHERE modified_by = 12345;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, t.amount, h.modification_date FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_history h ON t.transaction_id = h.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 AND h.new_amount < t.amount;
SELECT d.*, r.resolution_text FROM disputes d LEFT JOIN dispute_resolution r ON d.dispute_id = r.dispute_id WHERE d.resolved = FALSE;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.user_id, d.dispute_reason, r.resolved_by FROM transactions t JOIN disputes d ON t.transaction_id = d.transaction_id LEFT JOIN dispute_resolution r ON d.dispute_id = r.dispute_id WHERE r.resolution_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT dispute_reason, dispute_status FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'Open';
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_date, resolution_details FROM resolution WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT dispute_reason, dispute_status FROM disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'pending';
SELECT resolution_date, resolution_details FROM resolution ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT action_performed, table_affected FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
